p: Common comorbidities such as TB, CVD, COPD, HTN and depression exacerbate the economic burden for PWH, therefore an integrated model of care (Syndemic Care) that addresses relevant comorbidities and the social and behavioral factors that fuel them is likely to result in better health outcomes in the long term as well as reduce the economic burden on PWH over the course of their lives. This is especially relevant in the context of the Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic as discussed in a very recent (April 2020) publication on the burden of COVID-19 in PWH [ 37].
